room_title: Escape room "Blitzkrieg" by Avalanche Escape Rooms in Anchorage
review: This is some serious fun. Grab a group of 4-8 people and head over there before they get so popular that you can't get in. This game will spark your creativity as well as challenge you to think. I'm hooked and can't wait to go back.

room_title: Escape room "Blitzkrieg" by Avalanche Escape Rooms in Anchorage
review: We loved our time here!! Blitzkrieg was so much fun and we already can't wait to go back & try The Cure! We will definitely recommend this place to everyone. The staff is so friendly and it was just an overall great experience! Thank you!

room_title: Escape room "Blitzkrieg" by Avalanche Escape Rooms in Anchorage
review: Teenage boys had a great time working through Blitzkrieg, and they are determined to give the Cure a shot!

room_title: Escape room "Blitzkrieg" by Avalanche Escape Rooms in Anchorage
review: We had a group of 8 in the Blitzkrieg room with ages 13 thru 40. Every one of us had a great time and truly enjoyed ourselves. We are already planning our next adventure of finding The Cure.

room_title: Escape room "Blitzkrieg" by Avalanche Escape Rooms in Anchorage
review: Three of us did the Blitzkrieg escape room and it was tons of fun! We're planning on doing more. The staff was nice and helpful.
